data.title: A Ride To Safari Park: Izzat Bin Ismail SK Sultan Mudzaffar Shah
data.meta_description: RPM Y3 - Free download as Word Doc (.doc / .docx), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or view presentation slides online. This document outlines the scheme of work for a 3-week internship focusing on listening, speaking, reading, and writing skills. The internship will cover topics like a trip to the safari park and the school. Each week focuses on different language arts content standards and language skills, including pronouncing words correctly, following instructions, asking and answering questions about oral texts, reading phrases and sentences, writing neatly, enjoying poems and songs, and using prepositions properly. The goal is for students to gain these skills by the end of primary school.
